import React from 'react' import { MDXTag } from '@mdx-js/tag' import { Playground, PropsTable } from 'docz' import Preview from './Preview' import Display from './Display' import Planet from '../../orbitStories/Planet' import Moons from '../../orbitStories/Moons' import Sun from '../../orbitStories/Sun' import Satellites from '../../OrbitStories/Satellites' import { stack, relationships,composing } from './texts' export default ({components, ...props}) => {`Advanced usage`} {`Stacking/Compounded`} {`You can 'stack' components. When you stack, each component's loading and error argument will be 'merged' into eachother and act as one.`} { stack } {client => (
)} `} __scope={{props,Preview,Display,Planet,Moons,Sun,Satellites,stack,relationships,composing}}> {(client) => (
)} {`Relationships`} {`Related`} {`With the related prop you can get the related records of a Record. If a related Record is required for render, you can add the required prop. Collections cannot be required and will either return a Collection or an empty array.`} {`The root Record will always be the relatedTo source. In the following example all components relate to Planet.`} { relationships } {client => (
)} `} __scope={{props,Preview,Display,Planet,Moons,Sun,Satellites,stack,relationships,composing}}> {(client) => (
)} {`Composing and relatedTo`} {`By composing and use of the relatedTo prop you can create usefull combinations yourself.`} { composing } {({ planet, satellites, sun, loading, error }) => ( {({ satellites: relatedSatellites, loading, error }) => (
)} )} `} __scope={{props,Preview,Display,Planet,Moons,Sun,Satellites,stack,relationships,composing}}> {({ planet, satellites, sun, loading, error }) => ( {({ satellites: relatedSatellites, loading, error }) => (
)} )} {`Cache modes`} {`Cache modes can be set through the cache prop.`} {`Record`} {`For the Record components we have the following modes.`} {`only`} {`Component will only use the store's cache for queries.`} {`skip`} {`Component will skip the cache and query directly on the store, enabling all sources to participate.`} {`auto`} {`This is the default setting for Record components. Component will first query the store's cache for a result, if it doesnt find anything will query directly on the store.`} {`Collection`} {`only`} {`Component will only use the store's cache for queries.`} {`skip`} {`This is the default setting for Collection components. Component will skip the cache and query directly on the store, enabling all sources to participate.`}
